list_definition.mean_english: đi lại thường xuyên giữa hai nơi
list_definition.definition: to travel regularly between two places, especially between home in the suburbs and work in the city

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He commutes between Kent and London every weekday.

list_definition.definition: to change (a criminal sentence) for one less severe

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His death sentence was commuted to life imprisonment.
